评论概述: Order a size or a couple sizes up!
评论详情: I was a little worried ordering this top because I’ve seen it around a lot and I was thinking maybe it would show up looking totally different from the pics lol. But actually it looks just like the picture, it’s pretty comfy to wear, and the material doesn’t feel cheap it feels normal. You do have to corset the top yourself but I think that’s ok because some people might want it to be looser or tighter. But ORDER A SIZE OR TWO UP. I normally wear smalls in tops (I’m a B cup) , I ended up getting a large, so I can for sure tell it runs small. That’s the only reason I gave 4 stars because the sizing is very limited.
160 pounds 5”3 bought size large and it fits perfect. very happy with it. nice material.
